    Using the chessR Package

    Jason Zivkovic

    2020-04-29

    using_chessR_package.Rmd
    # install.packages("devtools")
# devtools::install_github("JaseZiv/chessR")

    Extracting raw chess game data

    library(chessR)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

    To extract raw chess game data in a data frame, use the get_raw_game_data() function. This function either accepts one player’s username, or a vector of multiple users.

    raw_chess <- get_raw_game_data("JaseZiv")
#> Extracting  JaseZiv  Data, please wait
#> Data extracted
    glimpse(raw_chess)
#> Observations: 176
#> Variables: 25
